name: Everything is Fine (Lotosos)
description:
A game where the player needs to follow a path to get free from his inner demons.

Everything can be out of the player control! Your goal is to arrive to the end of the map as fast as possible and with a low level of anxiety.

==================================

A, D  - Move

Space Bar - Jump, Double Jump

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with some enhancements.
